inputs.description: A collection of arguments for invoking getSamlProvider.

arn.description: ARN assigned by AWS for the provider.

tags.description: Tags attached to the SAML provider.

outputs.description: A collection of values returned by getSamlProvider.

createDate.description: Creation date of the SAML provider in RFC1123 format, e.g. `Mon, 02 Jan 2006 15:04:05 MST`.

id.description: The provider-assigned unique ID for this managed resource.

samlMetadataDocument.description: The XML document generated by an identity provider that supports SAML 2.0.

tags.description: Tags attached to the SAML provider.

validUntil.description: Expiration date and time for the SAML provider in RFC1123 format, e.g. `Mon, 02 Jan 2007 15:04:05 MST`.
